newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-First Boston features Revlon.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-First Boston features Revlon.

text.p: -- CS First Boston analyst said Revlon Inc is the featured stock of the week.
-- Analyst Lynne Hyman said an aggressive new product flow in 1997 and continued efforts to streamline operations should increase market share and operating profit margin.
-- said sees 25 percent operating growth in 1997.
-- said 12-month price target is $41 per share.
-- "We believe Revlon can generate superior growth over the next two to three years. Operating profits should increase 25 percent to 35 percent annually," Hyman said.
-- Fourth quarter estimate is $0.56 per share.
